name: Vybit
description: Vybit is a short video social media app through which all users are financially rewarded based on their engagement. With Vybit users are rewarded for posting compelling content and interacting with the community to create the overall most inclusive experience for all users. The reward is a daily distribution of in-app Vibes which can then be redeemed for our native Solana token $VI. All users who contribute to and engage with the community share the value that they create for the platform proportionally based on their interaction and the popularity of their content. From casual users to full-time creators, everyone earns with Vybit.
